sourcesContent: import React, {Component} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; class Register extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state ={ fname : "", lname : "", email : "", subject : "", message : "" } } onChange = (e)=>{ this.setState({ [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } onSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const visitorData ={ fname : this.state.fname, lname : this.state.lname, email : this.state.email, subject : this.state.subject, message : this.state.message } axios .post("/", visitorData) .then(res => console.log("Data Sent")) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render(){ return (
